data.ST: it was not with perishable things
you have a genuine love for your brothers
For you have been born again,

data.Español: habiendo sido declarada de buenas noticias
Habiendo puesto hacia fuera desde sí

data.LT: shall not be put to shame.”
data.ST: will never be put to shame.”
When they heaped abuse on Him,
if you do what is right
one conveying the words of God.

data.Español: cíñanse anudando (con cinto blanco de siervo)
